data.persona: I am always willing to work hard. I am tired of not being appriciated. I respect the king and fear him. I like to dance and spend time with my family.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The temple is massive and beautiful. It was made for the king that is said to be of the gods. The decorations come from only the most luxurious vendors in the world. Inside the temple there are many ancient artifacts that are used in rituals. The decorations are made of gold and shiny things.
There's a things, a coin, an artifact, and a door here.
The king's child is here.

You are carrying a duster, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the door so I can let the king's child inside.
data.mid_motivation: I have been ordered to clean the artifacts in the inside of the temple.
data.long_motivation: I have been ordered by the king to watch over the king's child alongside my other duties.
